Graph Exporter¶

class exporters.graph.graph_exporter.GraphExporter(config, db_name, log_root_path)[source]¶

This class exports the Gitana data to a graph representation

export(file_path, json_path)[source]¶

exports the Gitana data to a graph

Parameters:
  • file_path (str) – the path where to export the graph
  • json_path (str) – the path of the JSON that drives the export process
class exporters.graph.gexf_generator.GexfGenerator(cnx, logger)[source]¶

This class handles the generation of graphs in Gexf format

create(nodes_query, edges_query, type, file_path)[source]¶

creates the Gexf file

Parameters:
  • nodes_query (str) – SQL query of the nodes
  • edges_query (str) – SQL query of the edges
  • type (str) – type of the graph (directed, undirected)
  • file_path (str) – file path where to store the output
